body:
The minion-1 kublet is once again failing to connect to the master server.  Previously the problem was the default port change. This time it's less clear to me.

```
[mlamouri@blade16 kubernetes]$ kubectl cluster-info
Kubernetes master is running at https://10.245.1.2
KubeDNS is running at https://10.245.1.2/api/v1beta3/proxy/namespaces/default/services/kube-dns
```

_minon-1 kubelet config_

```
[vagrant@kubernetes-minion-1 ~]$ cat /etc/sysconfig/kubelet 
# TODO: remove nginx for other cloud providers.
# Disable registration for the kubelet running on the master on GCE.
# TODO(roberthbailey): Make this configurable via an env var in config-default.sh







DAEMON_ARGS=" --api_servers=https://10.245.1.2:6443  --hostname_override=10.245.1.3 --cloud_provider=vagrant --config=/etc/kubernetes/manifests --allow_privileged=False --v=2 --cluster_dns=10.247.0.10 --cluster_domain=cluster.local  "
```

_minion-1 kube-proxy config_

```
[vagrant@kubernetes-minion-1 ~]$ cat /etc/sysconfig/kube-proxy 


# TODO: remove nginx for other cloud providers.
  DAEMON_ARGS=" --master=https://10.245.1.2:6443 --kubeconfig=/var/lib/kube-proxy/kubeconfig --v=2"
```

_kubelet status_

```
[minion-1] sudo systemctl status kubelet -l
kubelet.service - Kubernetes Kubelet Server
   Loaded: loaded (/usr/lib/systemd/system/kubelet.service; enabled)
   Active: active (running) since Tue 2015-05-26 20:22:24 UTC; 18min ago
     Docs: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes
 Main PID: 2983 (kubelet)
   CGroup: /system.slice/kubelet.service
           ├─2983 /usr/local/bin/kubelet --api_servers=https://10.245.1.2:6443 --hostname_override=10.245.1.3 --cloud_provider=vagrant --config=/etc/kubernetes/manifests --allow_privileged=False --v=2 --cluster_dns=10.247.0.10 --cluster_domain=cluster.local
           └─3018 journalctl -f

May 26 20:40:38 kubernetes-minion-1 kubelet[2983]: E0526 20:40:38.984396    2983 kubelet.go:728] Unable to construct api.Node object for kubelet: failed to get instance ID from cloud provider: Post http://127.0.0.1:8000/login: dial tcp 127.0.0.1:8000: connection refused
May 26 20:40:45 kubernetes-minion-1 kubelet[2983]: E0526 20:40:45.986972    2983 kubelet.go:728] Unable to construct api.Node object for kubelet: failed to get instance ID from cloud provider: Post http://127.0.0.1:8000/login: dial tcp 127.0.0.1:8000: connection refused
May 26 20:40:46 kubernetes-minion-1 kubelet[2983]: E0526 20:40:46.150296    2983 file.go:53] Unable to read config path "/etc/kubernetes/manifests": path does not exist, ignoring
May 26 20:40:48 kubernetes-minion-1 kubelet[2983]: E0526 20:40:48.476591    2983 kubelet.go:1518] error getting node: node 10.245.1.3 not found
May 26 20:40:52 kubernetes-minion-1 kubelet[2983]: E0526 20:40:52.988425    2983 kubelet.go:728] Unable to construct api.Node object for kubelet: failed to get instance ID from cloud provider: Post http://127.0.0.1:8000/login: dial tcp 127.0.0.1:8000: connection refused
May 26 20:40:58 kubernetes-minion-1 kubelet[2983]: E0526 20:40:58.480547    2983 kubelet.go:1518] error getting node: node 10.245.1.3 not found
May 26 20:40:59 kubernetes-minion-1 kubelet[2983]: E0526 20:40:59.996271    2983 kubelet.go:728] Unable to construct api.Node object for kubelet: failed to get instance ID from cloud provider: Post http://127.0.0.1:8000/login: dial tcp 127.0.0.1:8000: connection refused
May 26 20:41:06 kubernetes-minion-1 kubelet[2983]: E0526 20:41:06.199604    2983 file.go:53] Unable to read config path "/etc/kubernetes/manifests": path does not exist, ignoring
May 26 20:41:06 kubernetes-minion-1 kubelet[2983]: E0526 20:41:06.997534    2983 kubelet.go:728] Unable to construct api.Node object for kubelet: failed to get instance ID from cloud provider: Post http://127.0.0.1:8000/login: dial tcp 127.0.0.1:8000: connection refused
May 26 20:41:08 kubernetes-minion-1 kubelet[2983]: E0526 20:41:08.485200    2983 kubelet.go:1518] error getting node: node 10.245.1.3 not found
```

title: Vagrant/Virtualbox - Minion Kublet fails to connect to master
